getAllSounds()
Returns a vector of the names of all sounds used in any animations or gestures this structure defines.
getAnimationNamed(String)
Returns the animation stored in this structure with the given name, or null if none.
getChoreography()
Returns the choreography stored in this structure.
getDefaultGesture()
Returns a gesture to use for moving from place to place when no gesture has been explicitly specified.
getDefaultPosition()
Returns a position to use for this structure when no position has been explicitly specified.
getGestureNamed(String)
Returns the gesture stored in this structure with the given name, or null if none.
getName()
Returns the name of this structure
getPositionNamed(String)
Returns the position stored in this structure with the given name, or null if none.
jointConnecting(String, String)
Returns the joint connecting two segments with the given names.
setChoreography(Choreography)
Sets the choreography stored in this structure

Structure 
  public Structure()

getAllSounds 
  public Vector getAllSounds()
Returns a vector of the names of all sounds used in any animations or gestures this structure defines. Each sound name is included only once. This can be useful for pre-caching the sounds.
getAnimationNamed 
  public Animation getAnimationNamed(String name)
Returns the animation stored in this structure with the given name, or null if none.
See Also:
Choreography
getChoreography 
  public Choreography getChoreography()
Returns the choreography stored in this structure.
getDefaultGesture 
  public Gesture getDefaultGesture()
Returns a gesture to use for moving from place to place when no gesture has been explicitly specified.
getDefaultPosition 
  public Position getDefaultPosition()
Returns a position to use for this structure when no position has been explicitly specified.
getGestureNamed 
  public Gesture getGestureNamed(String name)
Returns the gesture stored in this structure with the given name, or null if none.
See Also:
Choreography
getName 
  public String getName()
Returns the name of this structure
getPositionNamed 
  public Position getPositionNamed(String name)
Returns the position stored in this structure with the given name, or null if none.
See Also:
Choreography
jointConnecting 
  public Joint jointConnecting(String segmentName,
                               String otherSegmentName)
Returns the joint connecting two segments with the given names. Order of the two segment names is irrelevant. Returns null if no joint connects segments with these names.
setChoreography 
  public void setChoreography(Choreography newChoreography)
Sets the choreography stored in this structure
